components.title: Black Rightwards Arrow

description:
An arrow, pointing right.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
title: Black Rightwards Arrow

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: An arrow, pointing right. See the glossary for information on the term¬†black¬†in unicode character names. Right Arrow was approved as part of http://emojipedia.org/black-rightwards-arrow/
emoji_net_data.name: right arrow

bn:00109848a: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north
Designating the side of the body which is positioned to the east if one is facing north. This arrow points to the right: ?

bn:00101959a: Situated in or facing or moving toward the east
Situated or lying in or towards the east; eastward.

bn:00103172a: Immediately following in time or order
Coming next, either in sequence or in time.

bn:00101423a: Showing the way by conducting or leading; imposing direction on

bn:00088912v: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

bn:00029050n: East is a noun, adjective, or adverb indicating direction or geography.
One of the four cardinal directions
The cardinal compass point that is at 90 degrees
